title: Ukraine war: Germany's conundrum over its ties with Russia
description: Berlin now has some hard decisions to make following years of dialogue and co-operation with Moscow.

title: 'I felt more joy than I thought possible'
description: How it feels to treat your depression with a hallucinogenic drug.

title: Captagon: Jordan's undeclared war against Syria drug traffickers
description: Soldiers have a shoot-to-kill policy to stop millions of Captagon pills being smuggled from Syria.

title: Nigeria's Spider-Man fighting for a cleaner society
description: Jonathan Olakunle is fighting for a cleaner society in Osogbo, Nigeria.

title: 'I am only the UK's sixth black female QC'
description: Nneka Akudolu was told she had little chance of becoming a barrister, now she's a Queen's Counsel.

title: Why I didn't use my real name at work
description: Should you change your name to fit in at work? We look at why some people have anglicised their names.

title: Match of the Day 2 analysis: How Bruno Guimaraes won the game for Newcastle
description: Match of the Day 2 pundits Stephen Warnock and Leon Osman praise Newcastle's matchwinner Bruno Guimaraes after their 2-1 win over Leicester.

title: Sri Lanka healthcare on verge of collapse in economic crisis
description: Doctors warn of catastrophe in Sri Lanka where medical supplies are running out in the financial crisis.

title: World Snooker Championship 2022: Ronnie O'Sullivan beats David Gilbert
description: World number one Ronnie O'Sullivan showcases his mettle by coming from behind to beat David Gilbert 10-5 at the World Championship in Sheffield.

title: How well have Scotland and the UK coped with Covid?
description: As Scotland takes off the face masks, James Cook asks how the country has done tackling Covid.

title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Mane, Ronaldo, Werner, Mount
description: Who could threaten their club's goalscoring record? Which veteran should retire at the top this summer? Find out in Garth Crooks' latest Team of the Week.

title: Ukraine round-up: Ukraine defies Mariupol deadline as Kharkiv shelled
description: Mariupol defenders ignore Russian calls to surrender, as Kharkiv and other cities face more shelling.

title: Older residents of the east reluctant to hit the road
description: While young Ukrainians have moved to safety, many older residents say they have no choice but to stay.

title: In pictures: Mountain bikers descend snowy peak
description: About 300 daring riders made an Easter weekend descent of Aanoch Mor in the Highlands.

title: Royal children join parents at Easter service
description: The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge brought their older children to St George's Chapel in Windsor.

title: Next and finance firms buy JoJo Maman Bebe
description: There will be no immediate job losses at the baby goods retailer, although its founder will step down.

title: Rwanda plan not certain to deter migrants, says official
description: A top official said the policy would only be value for money if it stopped illegal entry to the UK.

title: Extinction Rebellion: Seventy arrested at climate change protests
description: Activists staged a spate of protests including scaling London's Marble Arch and an oil tanker.

title: No 10 parties: PM's lockdown fine constitutional crisis, says historian
description: A leading expert says Boris Johnson "broke the law", "misled Parliament" and "shredded the ministerial code".

title: Coventry fire: Two children among seven rescued from blaze
description: Five adults and two children are rescued from the "severe" blaze in a 15th-floor flat.

title: North Korea tests new weapon 'to improve tactical nukes'
description: Kim Jong-un clapped as he watched the launch - a new indication of his intention to resume nuclear tests.

title: Ukraine war: Trucks stuck at Poland-Belarus border as EU sanctions deadline passes
description: An 80km queue formed on the Polish border ahead of a deadline for Russian trucks to leave the EU.

title: Easter: Snowdonia mountain path covered in human faeces - guide
description: Snowdon guide Gemma Davies says she even caught a man defecating on the mountain's railway line.

title: Boris Johnson and Prince Charles remember war in Ukraine in Easter messages
description: Addressing Ukrainians in their language, Boris Johnson urged them to "be strong".

title: I decided not to let cancer stop me dating
description: Katherine Crowson was 29 when she was diagnosed, and wanted to know when she would get her life back.

title: Hull maritime pictures have decades of grime removed
description: The paintings will go back to the Maritime Museum in Hull after its refurbishment.

title: Ukraine: Online posts 'transform' war crimes documentation
description: Open-source evidence is increasingly used by the UN and war crimes investigators, says law professor.

title: Penguin power and the 'dream job' in Antarctica
description: Kit Adams, from Newcastle, reflects on his time at the Penguin Post Office in the wilderness of Antarctica.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Ungodly' Rwanda plan and drug scandal claims
description: The papers cover Justin Welby's criticism of refugee plans and fears over pills that harmed babies.
